channel.title: plush on Buckethead Creations
channel.description: Recent content in plush on Buckethead Creations

item.title: Denzel Williams - NoPixel GTA RP
item.description: Featured Image Gallery #slide-window { position: relative; width: 80%; height: 550px; overflow: hidden; top: 0px; left: 0px; margin: auto; } #slides-list { width: 80%; height: 550px; position: absolute; margin: 0; padding: 0; background-color: #cccccc; -webkit-transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transition: all 0.66s ease; -webkit-transition: all 0.66s ease; } .slide { list-style: none; position: relative; float: left; margin: 0; padding: 0; width: 80%; height: 550px; background: #ccc; text-align: center; line-height: 100%; background-size: contain; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: 50% 50%; color: #fff; -webkit-transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); -webkit-transform-style: preserve-3d; } .

item.title: Garlic - Into the Mists
item.description: Featured Image Gallery References Art by @kenha604. Maker’s Notes Pattern humanoid pattern and abs tutorial by Nazfx + self drafting Time Two months. Body Patterning I started with a store bought plushie from the spirit TV show, as it had the leg and hip definition I was looking to emulate. I tore it apart and copied the pattern, scanning it into the computer so that I could edit the lines using the path tool in gimp as per my standard workflow.

item.title: Squid Pouch
item.description: Pattern Pattern by Choly Knight Materials Shannon cuddle electric blue, sky blue, light blue invisible zip, Dashwood Studios Laska cotton whales All bought from plush addict Gallery Maker’s Notes Making a zip bag for the first time was fun. I should have pushed the tentacles further into the seam however, the lining lies a bit weirdly because they take up too much space on the inside.

item.title: Koala
item.description: Pattern Pattern by DIYFluffies/Mariska Vos-Bolman Materials Shannon cuddle platinum, black, white, sky blue, kelly green Black felt, white buttons All bought from plush addict Gallery
